name: City Park
description: A beautiful park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas.

name: Historic Museum
description: Discover the rich history of our town with exhibits dating back to the 1800s.

name: Local Library
description: A quiet place to read, study, and borrow books from a vast collection.

name: Art Gallery
description: Featuring local artists and rotating exhibitions of contemporary art.

name: Community Center
description: A hub for local events, classes, and gatherings.

name: Botanical Garden
description: A serene garden showcasing a variety of plants and flowers.

name: Sports Complex
description: Facilities for various sports including basketball, tennis, and swimming.

name: Music Hall
description: A venue for concerts, performances, and music events.

name: Cultural Center
description: Promoting cultural diversity through events, workshops, and exhibitions.
